name: Harlem Classic Burger
description: Blend Pat la Frieda beef, homemade pickles, onions, and special sauce on a buttered and toasted Potato Roll with cheese.

name: Hot Mess
description: Classic, topped with hot mess  (pickled cherry pepper and bacon) relish, American cheese, and smoky chipotle mayo

name: Impossible Jerk
description: Two  beef patties, American cheese, pickles, and onions, topped with jerk fries and jerk mayo.

name: Veggie Burger
description: Heavenly pizzas: fresh ingredients, melted cheese, savory flavors.

name: Harlem jerk
description: Two patties of proprietary blend Pat La Frieda beef, American cheese, pickles, and onions, topped with jerk fries and jerk mayo.

name: Chicken Sandwich
description: Juicy chicken breast topped with chedder cheese and bacon.

name: THE KALBI BURGER
description: Ground Marinated Short-Rib - Chuck - Brisket Blend, Gochujang & Sweet Pepper Remoulade, dill pickles on brioche.

name: THE BEYOND BURGER
description: Pico, avocado, fried jalapeno on a brioche bun (vegan)* On lettuce wrap*

name: HARLEM STEAK SANDWICH
description: Peppers, onions, cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, chipotle aioli

name: Papaya at Somtum Der
description: Som tum is the namesake dish of the eatery, a papaya salad made in several variations. Choose the Tum Thai Kai Kem.

name: Caesar salad at Carbone
description: Nuanced variation on the classic, amplified with warm garlic-bread croutons, anchovies and three types of cheese.

name: Wedge salad
description: Good steakhouse wedge, with Iceberg dressed with blue-cheese dressing, chopped tomatoes and bacon crumbles.

name: Roast carrot and avocado
description: Sour cream dolloped onto avocado and roasted carrots, endives and sugar-snaps showered in vinegar and shaved Reggiano

name: Asparagus cacio
description: Roman cacio e pepe by subbing out pasta for asparagus in this fresh salad, tangled with Pecorino in a  vinaigrette

name: CAESAR SALAD
description: Baby Romaine, Bacon, Anchovies, Parmesan, Croutons

name: SPICY TEXAN COBB
description: Mixed Greens, Chicken, Bacon, Apple, Tomato, Red Onion, Cucumber, Blue Cheese, Spicy Chipotle Ranch

name: Angry Nonna
description: Hot Soppressata, aged mozzarella, Calabrian chili oil, hot honey—Round or Square (8 Slices)

name: Pepperoni
description: Aged mozzarella, fresh tomato sauce, pepperoni cups.

name: Pizza Upside Down
description: Aged Mozzarella, Tomato Sauce, Grated Pecorino Romano, Extra Virgin Olive Oil-Square Only (8 Slices)

name: Pizza Vodka
description: Vodka Sauce, Whipped Ricotta, Pecorino Romano—Square Only (8 Slices)

name: House Pie
description: Aged mozarella, fresh tomato sauce, extra virgin olive oil, parmegianno reggiano, basil---Round or Square (8 Slices)

name: BUFFALO CHICKEN PIZZA
description: Shredded Cheddar Jack Blend, House Buffalo, Diced Celery and Carrots, Bleu Cheese Crumbles, Ranch Dressing

name: Somersby
description: blueberry, watermelon, apple   0.5L
